Line 20: Line 20:
'''FileHippo''' is an [[internet]] [[download]] [[website]]. It offers [[Open Source]] and [[freeware]] as well as [[shareware]] programs, but does not accept user uploaded files.<ref>http://www.filehippo.com/info/about/</ref> It also offers the FileHippo Update Checker, a program that scans your computer for installed software from the FileHippo catalog and suggests available updates for any installed programs.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.filehippo.com/updatechecker|title=Update Checker|publisher=FileHippo|accessdate=2011-03-31}}</ref> According to [[Quantcast]], FileHippo receives more than three million [[USA|US]] visitors each month and as of March 2010, [[Alexa Internet|Alexa]] lists FileHippo in the top 1000 most visited websites.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.quantcast.com/filehippo.com|title=FileHippo Quantcast Profile|publisher=Quantcast|accessdate=2011-03-31}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url =http://www.alexa.com/siteinfo/www.filehippo.com/|title=FileHippo on Alexa|accessdate=2011-03-31}}</ref>
'''FileHippo''' is an [[internet]] [[download]] [[website]]. It offers [[Open Source]] and [[freeware]] as well as [[shareware]] programs, but does not accept user uploaded files.<ref>http://www.filehippo.com/info/about/</ref> It also offers the FileHippo Update Checker, a program that scans your computer for installed software from the FileHippo catalog and suggests available updates for any installed programs.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.filehippo.com/updatechecker|title=Update Checker|publisher=FileHippo|accessdate=2011-03-31}}</ref> According to [[Quantcast]], FileHippo receives more than three million [[USA|US]] visitors each month and as of March 2010, [[Alexa Internet|Alexa]] lists FileHippo in the top 1000 most visited websites.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.quantcast.com/filehippo.com|title=FileHippo Quantcast Profile|publisher=Quantcast|accessdate=2011-03-31}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url =http://www.alexa.com/siteinfo/www.filehippo.com/|title=FileHippo on Alexa|accessdate=2011-03-31}}</ref>
  +   +
==FileHippo.com Update Checker==
  +
[http://www.filehippo.com/updatechecker/ FileHippo.com Update Checker] is a free program offered by FileHippo that scans a Windows computer and then reports out-dated software in a web-page, offering links to updated versions.
